sql-query.name: QueryProcessDefinitionList
sql-query.content: select procdef.id, procdef.type_id type_id, procdef.name, procdef.code, procdef.version, procdef.state, procdef.is_major_version, procdef.is_major_subversion, procdef.subversion, procdef.description, procdef.tenant_id, extend.create_date, extend.page_id from bpm_re_procdef procdef left join bpm_re_procdef_extend extend on (procdef.id = extend.procdef_id) where tenant_id =#{tenantId}
